Class TokenizerFactory<T extends org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizerfactory.TokenizerFactory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.factory.TokenizerFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterNGramTokenizerFactory, DefaultTokenizerFactory, NGramTokenizerFactory, TweetNLPTokenizerFactory

extends java.lang.Object
implements weka.core.OptionHandler, ApiWrapper<T>, java.io.Serializable
